# SOP-001: Document Control

## Purpose

Define the process for creating, reviewing, approving, and managing controlled documents.

## Scope

Applies to all QMS documents including policies, SOPs, and work instructions.

## Procedure

### 1. Document Creation

1. Author creates document using appropriate template
2. Document is assigned a unique ID
